flawed_nl_solution:
Half the pet-owners have a cat because 1 - 1/2 = 1/2
There are 60 pet owners because 30 / (1/2) = <<30/(1/2)=60>>60
The town has 10.0 citizens because 60 / 0.6 = <<60/0.6=10.0>>10.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100.0, not 10.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
